指挥部：衔尾蛇小队，收到请回复.Translation: Command: Ouroboros squad, signal received, please respond

这里是代号-衔尾蛇，正在等待进一步指令.Translation: This is codename Ouroboros, awaiting further instructions

指挥部：收到，自上次你们在灯塔的信号断开后，你们究竟经历了什么....Translation: Command: Received. Since your signal was lost at the lighthouse, what exactly have you been through...

我们在灯塔下发现了Asterac指挥官，是他给予了我们最后的帮助....Translation: We found Commander Asterac beneath the lighthouse. He gave us his final assistance...

但是代价是他的生命....Translation: But the cost was his life...

指挥部：向赴死者致敬...我们会通知他的队员，尽快给予他们处置....Translation: Command: Honor to the fallen... We will notify his team and arrange necessary measures as soon as possible...

已继承落雪小队的遗志.Translation: Carrying on the legacy of the Snowfall squad

指挥部：经历了重重磨难，你们终于来到了本次行动的终点....Translation: Command: After enduring countless hardships, you have finally reached the end of this operation...

指挥部：你们本次的最终任务...拯救你们的AURORA基地.Translation: Command: Your ultimate mission for this operation... Save your AURORA base

指挥部:在我们失去链接之后不久，我们就收到了来自AURORA基地的求救信号与异常.Translation: Command: Shortly after we lost the link, we received distress signals and abnormal fluctuations from the AURORA base...

指挥部:我们与AURORA的通讯几乎全部断开，猜测那里肯定遭遇了袭击。不过，AU.Translation: Command: Communications with AURORA are almost completely severed; we suspect it has faced an attack. However, AURORA's base defense is impenetrable from external invasion...

指挥部:我们推断可能是从基地内部的瓦解。衔尾蛇小队，我们会尽力给予你们帮助....Translation: Command: We infer internal collapse within the base. Ouroboros squad, we will do our best to assist you...

指挥部:直升机马上会降落在西部A1入口处，祝你们凯旋而归。机会乘今日，雌雄决此行.Translation: Command: The helicopter will soon land at the western A1 entrance. Wishing you a triumphant return. Seize the day and decide this journey.

AURORA基地竟然会沦陷.Translation: That the AURORA base could fall

希望他们安然无恙.Translation: Hope they are safe and sound

我们将会终结这场闹剧.Translation: We will put an end to this farce

呼叫指挥部，通往A1区域的路被障碍物封死，请求在该区域上空的支援.Translation: Calling command, the route to the A1 area is blocked by obstacles, requesting aerial support for that area

指挥部：收到，已将指令下达至该区域的侦测机，不久就会有轰炸机帮你们开路.Translation: Command: Acknowledged. Orders have been sent to the reconnaissance aircraft in the area. Bombers will clear the path soon.

指挥部：坚守阵地，他们很快就来.Translation: Command: Hold your ground; they will arrive soon

指挥部：批准执行区域轰炸，衔尾蛇小队，重整旗鼓，AURORA在等着你们.Translation: Command: Approval granted for regional bombardment. Ouroboros squad, regroup; AURORA is waiting for you

指挥部：循此苦旅，直抵群星.Translation: Command: Through this arduous journey, reach for the stars

紧急播报，3月16号上午，Aurora基地受到不明来源的信号攻击，该信号频率同时.Translation: Emergency broadcast: On the morning of March 16, Aurora Base was subjected to an unidentified signal attack. This signal frequency causes irreversible damage to both electronic devices and living organisms. Most affected organisms fall under unknown control

其行为大多表现为开始攻击附近的其他生物。如果你发现你身边的人或生物开始出现诸如以.Translation: Their behavior often manifests in attacks on nearby organisms. If you notice such abnormal behavior in people or creatures around you, please report it immediately to the local security department; they will provide effective assistance…

无论发生什么，请始终坚信黎明终将到来....Translation: No matter what happens, always believe that dawn will come...

指挥部：基地设有极其严密的安保措施，你们必须兵分两路，同时解除外部设施与内部设施.Translation: Command: The base has extremely tight security measures. You must split into two groups to simultaneously disable the external and internal security systems to open the gate leading to the core of the base.

指挥部：同时请务必小心你们必经之路上可能存在的危机。记住，不要让他们拖延你们的脚.Translation: Command: Also, please be cautious of potential dangers along your route. Remember, do not let them delay your progress.

这里的电梯应该可以通往地下基地.Translation: The elevator here should lead to the underground base

打碎那里的煤气罐，这能帮助我们炸碎玻璃。.Translation: Smash that gas tank; it can help us shatter the glass.

水井门将在5秒后开启，再过10秒后储藏室的大开启.Translation: The well gate will open in 5 seconds; the storage room will open 10 seconds after that.

15秒后通向地下实验2区的大门开启.Translation: The gate to Underground Lab Section 2 will open in 15 seconds.

运输梯将在25秒后启动.Translation: The transport lift will start in 25 seconds.

小心！他们要从后面的办公室涌出了！.Translation: Careful! They're rushing out from the rear office!

10秒后大门开启，注意撤退.Translation: The main gate will open in 10 seconds; prepare to retreat.

一楼按钮已解锁.Translation: The first-floor button has been unlocked.

快看！是生还...不，他已经没了气息，快捡起那把火焰喷射器，或许还能用....Translation: Look! Is that a survivor? No... he's gone. Quickly, grab that flamethrower; it might still work...

大门将在15秒后开启.Translation: The main gate will open in 15 seconds.

门将在20秒后破碎.Translation: The door will shatter in 20 seconds.

幸存者？不对，去捡起那把火箭发射器，或许对我们有用....Translation: A survivor? No, grab that rocket launcher; it might be useful for us...

下一个门将在10秒后开启.Translation: The next door will open in 10 seconds.

一楼实验室门已开启.Translation: The first-floor laboratory door has opened.
